aircraft.value: Falcon Prime - AC-1241-455 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Fastener hole elongation. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuselage Assembly component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 18/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 21/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 20/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 25/12/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 28/12/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical

Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuselage Assembly component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
